summmary: This is the line chart which describes the relationship between the x axis of GDP and the y axis of year. From the year values of 1992 to 2009, there is an increasing trend. We find the maximum value for GDP of 11700.22112 in year at 2008. We find the minimum value for GDP of 306.1686498 in year at 1993. This line chart has a moderately positive correlation.
